thread.title: Great hotel and location!
thread.title_full: Great hotel and location! - Review of Dumont NYC-an Affinia hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: SilvMC
title: Great hotel and location!
text:
This hotel was so beautiful and in a really great location - around the corner from the station.
The staff were all really helpful and accommodating. They could not have been more helpful. The restaurant was really nice the breakfast options were nice. I also used the gym which was a great facility. The room was so spacious and really nice.
I would recommend staying in this hotel.
